QAs.Question: This oil is good to make your beard and patchy sides grow ??
QAs.Answer: Overall I would say yes. It isn't an immediate fix or anything, but it will make a beard grow healthier which in turn can help with the patchiness..

Reviews.Comment: The dropper supplied with bottle takes a moment to get used to and the product spreads generously, so use less to make it last. Been using about 30 days an skin is softer and have noticed additional beard growth as well. Would prefer a different type of bottle but the product itself works well. Does not have a strong smell just enough..
So far best oil I've used. Love the large bottle. Thanks..
I hope you like black licorice...Because it's all you'll smell all day... Right. Under. Your. Nose.Oh.... And you can't return it. So don't think about "trying it out".

Love their gritty beard wax. Best product ever. But this oil….only on second use. Somewhat softer and hydrated my beard, but not sure I can stomach the scent. As others said, it does have a bad black licorice smell. Hate it. Lingers. Not sure it’s worth dealing with that..
